alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 9:16PM CST until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Mississippi, including the following counties, Chickasaw and Monroe. * WHEN...Until 1215 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 911 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated 1 to 3 inches of rainfall since Thursday afternoon. Another 1 to 1.5 inches of rainfall will be possible through midnight. Small creeks and low-lying areas will likely experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Amory, Aberdeen, Okolona, New Wren, Prairie, Trebloc, Nettleton, Hatley, Wren, Egypt, East Aberdeen, Binford, Becker, Muldon, Bigbee, Buena Vista, Strong and McCondy. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
